amendment.description: An amendment numbered 39 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to decrease the appropriation for National Institutes of Health buildings and facilities by $119,000,000 and increase the appropriation for the Strategic National Stockpile by $100,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harris amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harris amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harris amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
